name: Fishing Shop
description: A complete fishing equipment store providing rods, bait, and essential fishing supplies for beginners and professionals.

items.name: Fishing Rods
items.description: A selection of high-quality fishing rods designed for different fishing techniques and water conditions.

items.name: Spinning Rod
items.description: Light weight spinning rod suitable for fresh water fishing, ideal for beginners and casual anglers.

items.name: Casting Rod
items.description: Heavy duty casting rod designed for salt water fishing, offering strength and durability for larger fish.

items.name: Bait Shop
items.description: Provides fresh live bait in various quantities to support different fishing needs.

items.name: 10x Live Bait
items.description: Small pack of fresh live bait, suitable for short fishing sessions.

items.name: 50x Live Bait
items.description: Medium pack of fresh live bait, ideal for longer fishing trips.

items.name: 100x Live Bait
items.description: Large pack of fresh live bait, perfect for intensive fishing activities or group use.
